item.description: An armed subject has barricaded himself inside a home.

item.description: A NASA launch to the International Space Station was scrubbed due to weather.

item.title: Tampa woman accused of running bank fraud scheme advertised online
item.description: Once a fraudulent check is deposited, funds are immediately withdrawn before the check bounces.

item.title: Sarasota man sentenced for starving dog Chevy; receives max jail time
item.description: Chevy had cancer, was starving, and his body was covered in fleas and sores.

item.title: Hulk Hogan’s cause of death revealed
item.description: Professional wrestler Hulk Hogan died of a heart attack last week, according to a Florida medical examiner’s report released Thursday.
